                             boolean isUIcall)
        Saves the data model to the file in the variable. If this is null saveDataModelAs() is called
        Parameters:
        projectId - the id of the project
        isUIcall - informs the runtime if the call is initiated by the user or the system
        Returns:
        whether the operation was successful or not
